List<String> Feature = new List<String>();
List<String> Product = new List<String>();
List<String> SystemName = new List<String>();


List<JBCXM__Features__c> variable = new List<JBCXM__Features__c>();
JBCXM__Features__c features= null;
for(integer i=0 ; i<2 ; i++)
{
   features = new JBCXM__Features__c (JBCXM__Feature__c = 'features'+i,
						JBCXM__Product__c = 'pro'+i,
						JBCXM__SystemName__c = 'sys'+i);
    variable.add(features);
}
insert variable;
